import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import defaultAvatar from '../../assets/images/user/default-avatar.png';; const SingleCourse = (props) => { const { itemClass, courseID, courseImg, courseTitle, courseName, courseLesson, courseEnrolled, coursePrice } = props; return(
  • {courseName ? courseName : 'UX Design'}
  • {courseLesson ? courseLesson : '4'} Lessons

{courseTitle ? courseTitle : 'Dave conservatoire is the Entirely free online.'}

{courseEnrolled ? courseEnrolled : '77'} Students
{coursePrice ? coursePrice : '$68.00'}
) } export default SingleCourse
